casebody.data:
Hunter’s Administrator v. Chesapeake and Ohio Railway Company. January 11, 1917.

Absent, Prentis, J.

Curry & Curry and Timberlake & Nelson, for the plaintiff in error. J. M. Perry, for the defendant in error.

Richmond.

Error to a judgment of the Circuit Court of Rockbridge county.

Affirmed by Divided Court.
